Title: Blood disposition and urinary excretion kinetics of methazolamide following oral administration to human subjects.
Name: Methazolamide

Sentece: Using a two-compartment model, a series of differential equations were simultaneously fitted to blood concentrations and urinary excretion data generating estimates for k10 (0.035 +/- 0.019 h(-1)), k12 (0.200 +/- 0.036 h(-1)), k21 (0.077 +/- 0.046 h(-1)), k(a) (0.304 +/- 0.064 h(-1)), Vc (1.1 +/- 0.18 L) and f(r) (fraction excreted renally, 0.61 +/- 0.14).
Title: Blood disposition and urinary excretion kinetics of methazolamide following oral administration to human subjects.
